resources.string: Welcome to my Android mobile app.
Hello! My name is Jiemin, and I am a software developer.
I have a bachelor degree in CS and a Master degree in ECE in Michigan. I was both TA and RA during my graduate school time.
I am master in C and Java, especially Android. Familiar with whole mobile app development process, app structure and details to implement functionalities.
Again, welcome to my mobile app and you can swipe on the left edge or click icon on left-top corner to check those subsections for details.
Software Development in Android: Personal Portfolio, online ChatApp and 2D Shooting Game

These projects are to use Android studio v2.3.3 to do the Java coding and Node.js, JSON, HTTP to provide network server access. 
 • Understood Android Architecture including Linus Kernel, Libraries, Android Application Framework and top of them is application. 
 • Used Activities to program and Intent to initiate activities. Change colors, styles, themes by modifying xml file and using Drawable or Canvas to achieve graphics design. 
 • Used SurfaceView class for graphics and RecyclerView to save hardware resources. AsyncTask is also used for multi-thread processing to achieve smoother UI. 
 • MediaPlayer class is used for background music and SoundPool class for sound effects in shooting game. 
 • Used Node.js to set up server, and JSON string and HTTP protocol to achieve network communication. Granted permissions in Manifest file and Android Connectivity Manager class is used for networking. 
 • HTTPURLConnection is used on client-end and Picasso library is used to Asynchronous images from server.
Website designs: Recipes, High-school website and Online Bookstore

\n • Hand on Intel XDK and Adobe software Dreamweaver, used HTML language to design a website and used CSS to add styles to webpages \n • In high school website, achieved main webpage and multiple sub-pages including high school history, introduction, activities, photos and contact us pages.
